name: Similize the Savages LD#41
description:
https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/41/similize-the-savages

Made in 48 hours for Ludum Dare 41

Theme:  Combine 2 Incompatible Genres

Similize the Savages is a twins stick shooter/city simulation game. You’ve been sent to civilize the natives of a primitive planet.

Use your mighty spacegun to convert the savages and mark zones for them to develop their new city.

Keep your Sims happy by managing the capacity of all zones. Residential, industrial, commercial, and educational. Unhappy Sims will leave town.

Controls:

Move: WASD or ARROWS

Aim/shoot: Mouse (L-Click to shoot)

Cycle weapons: R-click

Can you make it to 100 citizens?
